page.title: 14A FARMERS WORK
page.content: The small farmers in our area work very hard, often rising at about 6.30am and finshing at evening time . Most farmers grow {wheat, barley, }and {rape} as well as rearing live stock. The rape is grown for oil and sent straight from the combine to the oil crushers. Cereal crops are used mainly for animal feed. A typical farmer we spoke to has over 700 pigs, and he spends much of his working day looking after them. They are fed early in the morning and cleaned out once a week. A farmers work may be harder or more unpleasant than an ordinary persons job for example he may have to be available 7 days a week, 52 weeks a year including Xmas Day and Bank Holidays. People have to be called in to look after the animals if he wishes to take a break.
